text: Barbara Marx Hubbard (born Barbara Marx; December 22, 1929 – April 10, 2019)Heal Your Life: Most Important Question: What would you ask the President? January 15, 2012. was an American futurist, author and public speaker. She was known for creating "The Synergy Engine"Dekel, G. The Synergy Engine. and the "birthing" of humanity.Lessons from Neale Donald Walsch ‘The Mother of Invention: The Legacy of Barbara Marx Hubbard and the Future of You’. Part 1, page VII She was born in New York City. She was the Co-founder and president of the Foundation for Conscious Evolution. She was the subject of a biography by author Neale Donald Walsch, The Mother of Invention: The Legacy of Barbara Marx Hubbard and the Future of "YOU."The Foundation for Conscious Evolution Website: Mother of Invention Deepak Chopra called her, "the voice for conscious evolution." In 1984, she was nominated for Vice President of the United States for the Democratic Party.1984 Democratic National Convention Speech She lost the bid to Geraldine Ferraro. On April 3, 2019, Hubbard was hospitalized for a knee infection.
